structure.unit: TRAFFIC REGULATIONS -- VEHICLE EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE

law.text: As used in this section, KRS 189.2325, 189.2329, 189.390, and 189.394, "highway work zone" means that lane or portion of a state-maintained highway open to vehicular traffic and the affected area adjacent to a lane, berm, or shoulder of a state-maintained highway upon which construction, reconstruction, resurfacing, or other work of that nature is being conducted.
law.history: Created 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 37, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1996.
